column4: does ubuntu have a usenet download program?  Similar to windws newsleecher?
so will ubuntu let me watch dvd's?
cause i installed suse and i couldn't play them without jumping through hoops
yeah you need to install a codec probably though
still the same problem, BUT if I browse to the folder with the song it plays fine
so it's a bug?  Can't do anything about it? :(
that's a really odd problem, I would file a bug and let the devs know about it
ok thanks, how would I got about filing a bug report?
right click an mp3 file and select open with other application then goto /usr/bin/xmms
but it doesn't set it to open mp3's with xmms from that point on, only that 1 time
not if you stick with the Ubuntu kernel/driver
